name: Flight of Hesepholes
description:
"Flight of Hesepholes: an episode in Mnomen wherein the cosmic prisoner Mariran gets his comeuppance"

Overview:

This game was submitted to the 5-day ZenoJam 6 game jam (theme: going up). For this jam, I decided to port/enhance a segment of a very old game of mine going back to 2002 (Mnomen 4). This minigame celebrates the 20th Anniversary of the Mnomen series which at one time enjoyed a small fanbase within the early Game Maker community. Play until the end for an exciting reveal!

Playing the Game:

This game is currently not designed for mobile devices. To play in your PC browser, be sure to click within the canvas after hitting "Run Game." There is also a downloadable Windows version available.

Controls:

During the fight sequence, maneuver with the D-Pad or A, W, D.

Credits:

Tyler Wright: story/dialogue, programming, art, music

Special thanks to James Fajardo for the original font used for the Mnomen logo.
